creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
inscription:
Front cover, silver marker: Fly
Inside of front cover, black ink pen: Here's some inspiring thoughts to / help you survive the holidays. / Hope the holidays didn't do any / [ermanent damage to your / mental health. / Stay warm / We're thinkin' of you. / Our Love, / Noah + Wendy / 12/96
title: A Book of Thoughts
